basics.name: Shrestha Singh
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: Disciplined computer science engineering professional with strong management skills and a talent for organizing events. Passionate about coding, constantly learning and growing, with strong public speaking abilities to effectively communicate complex ideas. Keen eye for detail and proven ability to lead teams to successful project completion.

work.name: NRSC - National Remote Sensing Centre, New Delhi
work.summary: Successfully completed a dissertation at RRSC-North, NRSC, ISRO. Worked on "Analyzing Nyaya Vikas Portal: Exploring Diverse Data Science Methodologies for Enhanced Insight and Efficiency."

work.name: ISRO - Indian Space Research Organisation, Ahemdabad
work.summary: Applied data science on big data of satellite to build an algorithm for the study of parameters in cyclone areas. A data science approach to ocean wind remote sensing from CYGNSS satellite observations using probability statistics.

work.name: IMD - India Meteorological Department, New Delhi
work.summary: Worked on bidirectional visitor counter using Raspberry Pi Pico; conducted research on it for situations like Covid 19.

education.area: Computer Science (Specialization in AI and Robotics)

awards.title: Winner, Generative AI Hackathon (Language AI)
awards.summary: Our team, UnderGod, emerged victorious in the Generative AI Hackathon (Language AI) organized by Samsung PRISM Team at Vellore Institute of Technology. Project: Seamless AI

awards.title: Winner, Valeo AI for Sustainability Hackathon
awards.summary: Our focus on sustainable product design reflects our commitment to environmental stewardship.

projects.name: Seamless AI
projects.description: Developed an advanced AI suite that integrates natural language processing, computer vision, and multimodal capabilities. This project supports 11 widely spoken Indian languages, including low-resource languages, providing a unified and intuitive experience for users across various input modes and languages.

projects.name: Rachel.AI
projects.description: Your AI Paralegal Assistant ,Revolutionize your legal operations with our open-source AIassistant. Ingest, summarize, question, and analyze thousands of casefiles with ease.

projects.name: Legal Document Analysis
projects.description: Effortlessly analyze legal documents using Natural Language Processing (NLP). Summarize legal documents, identify entities like individuals, organizations, and locations, and extract key information.

projects.name: Scenario Weaver
projects.description: Transforms the way emergency dispatchers are trained and evaluated. With the power of advanced AI models like Google's Gemini, it generates realistic and dynamic simulation scenarios, preparing dispatchers to handle critical situations with confidence and precision.

projects.name: Replica
projects.description: Allows you to create a personalized AI clone, utilizing various APIs to provide a dynamic experience.

projects.name: STELLA - Smart Text Extraction, Learning, and Language Assistant (v2)
projects.description: Powerful, context-aware chatbot designed to provide accurate and grounded answers to user queries based on a comprehensive knowledge base. Leverages advanced techniques like multi-faceted retrieval, self-reasoning, and an anti-hallucination engine.
